mapper.select: select t1.no as "no", t1.date as "date", t1.expenses as "expenses", t1.desc as "desc", t1.user_no as "user_no", t1.orderstate_no as "orderstate_no", t1.patient_no as "patient_no", t2.name as "patient_name" from "order" t1, patient t2 where t1.patient_no = t2."no" and orderstate_no = 2
